examples.text: the artistic works of the period
a work of great artistic merit
an artistic temperament *(= behaviour thought to be typical of artists, musicians, etc.)*
Love is a time-honoured subject of literary and artistic expression.

definitions.definition: showing a natural skill or pleasure in art, especially being able to paint or draw well

examples.text: She comes from a very artistic family.

definitions.definition: done with skill and imagination; attractive or beautiful

examples.text: an artistic arrangement of dried flowers
The decor inside the house was very artistic.

definitions.definition: the freedom of artists or writers to change facts in order to make a story, painting, etc. more interesting or beautiful
